General_Description: '''The Big Game''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "Predatory beasts pose a threat in an allied state." – Leader of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed various dangerous beasts in the region, and was rewarded for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Bloody Beasts]], [[Dangerous Fangs]], and [[Open Season]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
